about_the_game:
SlipDream Resonator is a futuristic, multi-directional rhythm game with unique twin-stick analogue controls. Inspired by both classic rhythm games and top-down shooters, SlipDream Resonator offers addictive arcade gameplay designed to challenge while featuring eye catching visuals and a heart pumping soundtrack.

Integration through Simulation




SlipDream is a state of consciousness that allows a person to dream while being fully awake. As an attempt to create a machine that could induce such a state Advara Therapeutics created SlipDream Resonator. The simulated levels embedded within have been programmed to fully activate the user's mind and body through false stimulus and a direct link to our cloud based neural encoder. The path has been laid before you, embodiment is at your fingertips, integration has already begun.

Potentially endless music based levels


SlipDream Resonator features 23 built in levels, each with a unique soundtrack and background visual.

Players can also create and share their own Custom levels featuring custom music, album art, and background video. Join the Discord community to find a library of user made levels ready for download.

With 5 difficulty levels SlipDream is accessible to all skill levels while still offering a challenge to the true die-hards.

Soundtrack featuring music by:

  • Maxo
  • Lindsay Lowend
  • recovery girl & Diana starshine
  • Splashblade
  • Varra
  • Shady Monk
  • Moistbreezy
  • Elevation
  • DeBisco
  • And more!!!

Power-ups




Power-ups have been dispersed in each simulated level to help aid in difficult moments and encourage breakthroughs. The 4 available power-ups are detailed below.

  • Atomic
Destroys all spawned notes at once. One time use per activation.

  • Circle
Engages every node at once. Useful for sustained notes and breakthrough levels. Three uses per activation

  • Time
Temporarily slows down time. One time use per activation

  • Laser
Destroys all spawned notes in a specific lane. Three uses per activation

Global Leaderboards




Check out the Global Leaderboards to see how you stack up against the competition. Global Leaderboards are available for all levels, both built-in and custom.

Free Play


Free Play allows the user to customize their experience with a variety of options, including:

  • Invincibility
  • Slow Mo
  • Powerup Probability
  • Double speed

& more

name: SlipDream Resonator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later, 64-bit versions
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Processor, 2ghz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
